alert.note: Alert for Rio Blanco (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 1:25PM MDT until September 04 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Rio Blanco County in northwestern Colorado... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 125 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meeker, or 37 miles southwest of Craig, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Rio Blanco County. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 38 and 49. Colorado 64 near mile marker 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
